title: Budget Manager App
description: A tool to track company budgets, and see live data and analytics.

details.project_details: This project took place at the Public Urbain Community - Le Havre (France) where I worked 2 years as a developper. It was designed to be used as an intern tool, to track the budget lines of any service and create dynamic reports with PowerBI

title: Court Late Allowance Calculator
description: A tool to calculate how much the French Government owe you for being late.

details.project_details: This project is an innovative idea from Sagan Lawyers, Paris. Any user can, thanks to the tool, see how much they can ask the court for the late allowance.

title: Minting API
description: An API to create and mint any NFT on the Solana Blockchain

details.project_details: I worked as a freelance for a Web3 project that needed a minting API on the solana blockchain. Users can, via API calls, create, upload and mint their own NFT, making easy the NFT minting on the Solana Ecosystem
